rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with reception area and cloakroom.
Open concept living space with large windows for natural light.
Dining area integrated with the kitchen; ample ventilation and natural lighting.
Modern kitchen with efficient layout and skylight to enhance natural light.
Separate bathroom for guests ensuring privacy.

openings.location: east and west walls of living room and kitchen
openings.features: Large floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light and ventilation
Provides outdoor access and fresh air
